readme:
## Case Study 📧

Want to collect email subscribers without paying expensive monthly fees? 💰 This workflow creates a free email collection system with built-in email verification to ensure you only collect legitimate email addresses! ✨

## Learn more:

📺 [Watch the tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NgvEHwu19Rs&t=2s):

📝 [Read the detailed guide](https://rumjahn.com/create-email-capture-forms-for-free-using-n8n-and-sendgrid-and-easily-grow-your-subscriber-list/)

## What this workflow does 🛠️

  * Creates a customizable email collection form that can be embedded on your website 🌐
  * Verifies email addresses using [Hunter.io](http://Hunter.io) to filter out fake or invalid emails ✅
  * Stores verified email addresses in SendGrid for your email marketing needs 📊
  * Completely free solution (except for [Hunter.io](http://Hunter.io)'s 50 free monthly credits) 🆓



## Setup ⚙️

  1. Set up a free [Hunter.io](http://Hunter.io) account for email verification
  2. Configure your SendGrid account credentials
  3. Customize the email collection form fields
  4. Get the embedded form code for your website



## How to adjust it to your needs 🔧

  * Add additional form fields beyond just email collection
  * Customize the form's appearance and labels
  * Modify the verification logic based on your requirements
  * Connect to different email marketing platforms instead of SendGrid
  * Add additional automation steps after email verification



## Benefits 🌟

  * No monthly subscription fees for email collection 💸
  * Built-in email verification prevents fake signups 🛡️
  * Scalable solution that won't lock you into expensive plans 📈
  * Clean email list with only verified addresses ✨
  * Simple setup and customization 🎯



This workflow is perfect for bloggers, small businesses, and anyone looking to build an email list without getting locked into expensive email marketing platforms as their subscriber count grows! 🚀

Built by [rumjahn](https://rumjahn.com)

readme_zh:
## 案例研究 📧

想免费收集邮件订阅用户，避免高昂的月费？💰 这个工作流能创建带自动邮箱验证的免费采集系统，确保只收集真实有效的邮箱地址！✨

## 了解更多：

📺 [观看教程](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NgvEHwu19Rs&t=2s):

📝 [阅读详细指南](https://rumjahn.com/create-email-capture-forms-for-free-using-n8n-and-sendgrid-and-easily-grow-your-subscriber-list/)

## 工作流功能 🛠️

* 创建可自定义的邮箱采集表单，支持嵌入网站 🌐
* 通过 [Hunter.io](http://Hunter.io) 验证邮箱有效性，过滤虚假地址 ✅
* 将验证通过的邮箱存储至SendGrid供营销使用 📊
* 完全免费（仅消耗 [Hunter.io](http://Hunter.io) 每月50次免费额度） 🆓

## 设置指南 ⚙️

1. 注册 [Hunter.io](http://Hunter.io) 免费账户用于邮箱验证
2. 配置SendGrid账户凭证
3. 自定义表单字段
4. 获取网站嵌入代码

## 自定义调整 🔧

* 扩展表单字段（不限于邮箱采集）
* 修改表单样式与标签文字
* 根据需求调整验证逻辑
* 替换SendGrid为其他营销平台
* 添加验证后的自动化步骤

## 核心优势 🌟

* 零月费邮箱采集方案 💸
* 内置验证机制杜绝虚假注册 🛡️
* 可扩展架构避免后期费用暴涨 📈
* 纯净的已验证邮箱列表 ✨
* 简易设置与灵活定制 🎯

特别适合博主、小微企业等需要建立邮件列表，又不想被订阅量增长绑架到昂贵营销平台的用户！🚀

由 [rumjahn](https://rumjahn.com) 开发
